mapper.select: SELECT al.albumId as 'album_id', al.name as 'album_name', al.releaseDate as 'album_release_date', ar.artistId as 'artist_id', ar.name as 'artist_name' FROM Albums al LEFT JOIN AlbumArtists aa ON aa.albumId = al.albumId LEFT JOIN Artists ar ON ar.artistId = aa.artistId WHERE al.albumId = #{id}

SELECT al.albumId as 'album_id', al.name as 'album_name', al.releaseDate as 'album_release_date', ar.artistId as 'artist_id', ar.name as 'artist_name' FROM Albums al LEFT JOIN AlbumArtists aa ON aa.albumId = al.albumId LEFT JOIN Artists ar ON ar.artistId = aa.artistId ORDER BY al.releaseDate DESC

SELECT al.albumId as 'album_id', al.name as 'album_name', al.releaseDate as 'album_release_date', ar.artistId as 'artist_id', ar.name as 'artist_name' FROM Albums al LEFT JOIN AlbumArtists aa ON aa.albumId = al.albumId LEFT JOIN Artists ar ON ar.artistId = aa.artistId WHERE al.releaseDate >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR ORDER BY al.releaseDate DESC

SELECT al.albumId as 'album_id', al.name as 'album_name', al.releaseDate as 'album_release_date', ar.artistId as 'artist_id', ar.name as 'artist_name' FROM AlbumArtists aa LEFT JOIN Albums al ON aa.albumId = al.albumId LEFT JOIN Artists ar ON ar.artistId = aa.artistId WHERE aa.artistId = #{id} ORDER BY al.releaseDate DESC

SELECT al.albumId as 'album_id', al.name as 'album_name', al.releaseDate as 'album_release_date', ar.artistId as 'artist_id', ar.name as 'artist_name' FROM Albums al, AlbumArtists aa, Artists ar WHERE ( al.name LIKE #{query} OR ar.name LIKE #{query} ) AND ( aa.albumId = al.albumId AND ar.artistId = aa.artistId )
